data.title: Capital Wealth Advisors
data.meta_description: Your Janney Financial Advisor is always available to discuss any needs or concerns and explore strategies that will help you and your family move closer to your goals.
data.text:
Our Team

The inception of our team goes back to the early 1980’s when Bob Black, Ned Manuel, and Edward Blumenthal entered the business. Ten years later, Bob Borkowski started his Wall Street career. Late in 2004, the duo of Ed Blumenthal and Bob Borkowski joined forces with Bob Black and Ned Manuel, in order to take advantage of our collective strengths and forge a partnership that prioritizes client service and individualized recommendations.

We are also very fortunate to have such a talented and dedicated team of Private Client Associates, all of whom have more than a decade of experience in our business. They handle all the day-to-day administrative matters, and routinely assist us in delivering and implementing our investment management and financial planning advice to our clients in a timely, efficient and highly personalized manner.

Robert Black

Executive Vice President / Wealth Management, Financial Advisor

About Robert

Bob has been in the industry for over 30 years and is committed to doing the right thing for the client. Since attending American University for business, Bob has honed his particular skill set in fixed income investments. He holds his series 7 and 63 licenses. He is especially proud of his relationship with his clients, several of which span decades as well as generations.

In his personal time, he has coached lacrosse for many years, both in an established program in his own town and a fledgling program in a neighboring town. He has two children, Ted and Victoria, who have recently graduated college and are embracing their independence. They are enthusiastic about their future endeavors.

Ned Manuel

Executive Vice President / Wealth Management, Financial Advisor

About Ned

Ned began his career at E.F. Hutton & Co. in Hartford, CT. For more than 30 years, Ned has focused on fixed income investing. He believes in always doing right by the client and his success is a direct result of his clients satisfaction. He is a graduate of the Gunnery School in Washington, CT and Ohio Wesleyan University and he holds his series 6, 7 and 63 licenses.

Outside of his work he enjoys boating, skiing, tractors and doing just about anything outdoors. He is married to his wife of 25 years, Andrea, and has two sons, Ethan and Henry.

Edward Blumenthal

Senior Vice President / Wealth Management, Financial Advisor

About Edward

For more than 30 years, Ed has taken a personalized approach to recommending sensible, realistic plans to the team's clients. He holds his series 6, 7, 8 and 63 licenses. A graduate of the University of Denver, Ed received his bachelor's degree in economics and history.

An active member of his community, he has volunteered for a pancreatic cancer foundation for the past five years. Outside of work, he enjoys golfing, cooking, and gardening. Ed is married to his wife, Carolyn, with three children, Noah, Charlotte, and Nate, and two stepdaughters, Liza and Caitlin.

Robert Borkowski

Senior Vice President / Wealth Management, Financial Advisor

About Robert

Bob has over 20 years of experience in the industry and holds his series 7, 63, 65, and insurance licenses. A graduate of Boston College, Bob received his bachelor's degree in Finance and Operations & Strategies Management.

Bob is a former member of both the Board of Directors for the Shuttle Meadow Country Club and the Zoning Board of Appeals for Southington Planning and Zoning. He is also the former President for the Southington North Little League.

Richard Cardinal

Account Executive

About Richard

Richard Cardinal, CFP® began his investment career in 1997 following his work as a branch manager in Stamford at Connecticut Bank of Commerce. In addition to his Certified Financial Planner™ designation, he has his series 7, 63, 65, 3, and 31 licenses along with Connecticut insurance licenses. With more than 20 years of experience, Rich has been recognized by colleagues for two decades of client-centered professionalism. In 2000, he was appointed by Prudential Securities to the Client Navigator Advisory Council highlighting excellence in customer service.

He has a B.A. from Southern Connecticut State University and a passion for genealogy and DNA ancestry research. He lives with his wife, daughter and mini-golden doodle in Simsbury, Connecticut.

Jennifer Lange

Senior Registered Private Client Associate

About Jennifer

Jennifer has worked with Ned Manuel and Robert Black since 2002, subsequently joining Ed Blumenthal and Robert Borkowski to form the Capital Wealth Advisors group in 2004. A graduate of the University of Connecticut, she holds her Series 7 and 66 licenses and has over 20 years of experience in the financial services industry.

Jennifer lives in Tolland with her husband, Jon, and three stepsons, Aaron, Adam, and Andrew.

Samantha Prokop

Private Client Associate

About Samantha

Samantha has worked with the Capital Wealth Advisor team since 2005. She joined the group after earning a BS in Mathematics. She acts as an administrative liaison for clients to provide them with vital aspects of client services, addressing topics such as new accounts, online services, distributions and general client questions and concerns.

Samantha lives in Plainville, Connecticut, with her son Blake.

Sheila Rogan

Senior Registered Private Client Associate

About Sheila

Sheila is a Senior Registered Private Client Associate with the Capital Wealth Advisor team. She graduated from Hobart and William Smith Colleges with a BA in Psychology. Sheila has over 30 years of experience in the financial services industry. Over the past 3 decades she has worked at Smith Barney, Dean Witter, Morgan Stanley and UBS as an AVP in Retirement Plans, a Retirement Plan Consultant, and various senior client services roles supporting financial advisors.

Outside of the office, Sheila enjoys Crossfit, playing golf and hiking.

Noah Blumenthal

Account Executive

About Noah

After graduating with a bachelor’s degree in English from the University of Denver in 2017, Noah worked at a small start-up company that manufactured poker chips. In the fall of 2019 Noah joined Transamerica Capital as an Internal Wholesaler on the mutual fund desk where he remained until joining Capital Wealth Advisors as an Account Executive in January 2022. Noah holds the Series 7 and 63 licenses and is studying for the CFP certification.

Noah spent the last decade in Colorado, honing his skiing abilities and enjoying the Rocky Mountains to their fullest potential. He has a big Siberian husky named Yogi that he goes everywhere with. You're likely to see the pair going on long walks in the West Hartford Reservoirs on the weekends. Noah loves to cook and considers himself a Michelin star chef when not in the office. When he’s not cooking or walking Yogi, Noah is an avid golfer and squash player and loves staying active. Noah Currently resides in West Hartford, CT.

Noah supports the team in Financial Planning, Trading, and Investments and looks forward to growing into all areas of the business as he continues to learn.

Nicholas Borkowski

Registered Private Client Associate

About Nicholas

Nick earned his Bachelor of Science in Sport Management from Endicott College in 2022. Throughout his college years, he gained experience in sports management through internships with the New Britain Bees, Northeastern Club Sports, and the Southington Community YMCA. Post-graduation, Nick decided to pivot towards a career in finance.

This transition led him to join Fidelity Investments as a Customer Relationship Advocate in the summer of 2022. Upon passing his Series 66 exam, Nick advanced to the role of Investment Solutions Representative. After a two-year tenure at Fidelity Investments in Rhode Island, he moved to Capital Wealth Advisors as a Registered PCA in April of 2024. Nick is certified with Series 7, 63, and 66 licenses.

An avid golfer, Nick enjoys playing in Southington and is a fan of baseball and football. He values time spent with friends and family.

He currently resides in Southington, CT.
